Title: Frontend Development Roadmap
Description: A step-by-step guide to become a frontend developer, from HTML to advanced React.

Title: .NET Backend Developer Roadmap
Description: Master backend development with C#, .NET Core, and Entity Framework.

Title: Full Stack Web Developer Roadmap
Description: Combine frontend and backend skills to build complete web applications.

Title: Android Developer Roadmap
Description: Learn Kotlin and Android Studio to build native Android apps.

Title: iOS Developer Roadmap
Description: Start with Swift and Xcode to create beautiful iOS applications.

Title: Cross-Platform Mobile Developer Roadmap
Description: Build apps for both Android and iOS using Flutter.

Title: Game Developer Roadmap (Unity)
Description: Create 2D/3D games using Unity and C# scripting.

Title: Cybersecurity Analyst Roadmap
Description: Learn ethical hacking, network security, and defensive techniques.

Title: Data Analyst Roadmap
Description: Go from Excel to SQL and Power BI to tell stories with data.

Title: Data Scientist Roadmap
Description: Master Python, statistics, and machine learning to solve real-world problems.

Title: UI Designer Roadmap
Description: Learn visual design, typography, and Figma to create stunning interfaces.

Title: UX Researcher Roadmap
Description: Understand users, conduct research, and design human-centered experiences.
